game.beginning: The story begins on the dusty lunar surface, with the camera focused on an old spacecraft whose pilot door is ajar.
game.ending: As the main character descends to the surface, she can hear distant voices echoing off the rocks.
game.synopsis: The main character, referred to simply as "the astronaut," emerges into the harsh vacuum of space. The first thing the astronaut notices is a greenish haze, visible from certain angles.
game.title: Moon Rush
